thread.title: William Snoding
thread.title_full: Love Energy Savings reviewed by William Snoding

author: William Snoding
title: William Snoding
text: Being a busy business owner my time is precious, and having to look through lots of Quote: s and handle lots of phone calls takes time I just don't have. I handed all that headache to Love Energy, and they kept me in the loop as the deal progressed. Jonathan Silcock My account Manager just called me 2 months after the new contract, just to see how things were going , and as it turned out my Supplier had created a problem, so I told him and he was straight on the phone to them.
